title: Flowers from the Storm
description: He is London's most notorious rakehell-a charming, irresistible seducer possessing a brilliant mind and reckless passions. Until, in the wake of a shocking tragedy he is condemned to a world of shadow... and madness.An innocent beauty of modest birth and simple faith, once she feared the dashing nobleman who awakened within her feelings she had never known. Now she has come to free him from his solitary torment - never dreaming her warm, healing touch will eternally bind them together in need, in desire... and in love.
author: Laura Kinsale
